metadata.synopsis: Gale is interested in items woven with especially powerful magic. In these lines, you come across one such item. This one is a Thayan book of necromancy.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Bet this book of necromancy has some hefty magic in it. Gale, what do you think?

1.speaker: Gale
1.text: Ah, a Thayan artefact. Yes, this is very promising.
